mapper.insert: insert into tbl_bucket (p_id, member_id, price, quantity) values (#{p_id}, #{member_id}, #{price}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_bucket AS b LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_member AS m ON b.member_id = m.member_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_product AS p ON b.p_id = p.p_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_attach AS a ON p.p_id = a.p_id WHERE m.member_id = #{member_id};
